description.zh-cn: 自2022年9月16日以来在伊朗爆发的大规模示威运动，由玛莎·阿米尼之死引发，抗议强制佩戴头巾及伊朗伊斯兰共和国政府的统治。
description.en: A series of large-scale protests that began in Iran on September 16, 2022, sparked by the death of Mahsa Amini, protesting against the compulsory hijab and the rule of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

description.zh-cn: 22岁的伊朗库尔德族女子玛莎·阿米尼在被指导巡逻队逮捕后于医院死亡的事件，该事件是阿米尼示威的直接导火索。
description.en: The death of Mahsa Amini, a 22-year-old Iranian Kurdish woman, in a hospital after being arrested by the Guidance Patrol. This event was the direct trigger for the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 22岁的伊朗库尔德族女子，因“违反着装规范”被指导巡逻队逮捕后死亡，她的死引发了全国性的阿米尼示威。
description.en: A 22-year-old Iranian Kurdish woman who died after being arrested by the Guidance Patrol for an 'improper hijab,' her death sparked the nationwide Mahsa Amini protests.

nodes.id: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

zh-cn: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府
en: Government of the Islamic Republic of Iran

description.zh-cn: 伊朗的执政当局，是阿米尼示威的主要抗议对象。
description.en: The ruling authority of Iran, the main target of the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗的道德警察，负责监督公众执行头巾令等伊斯兰教着装规范。因逮捕并导致玛莎·阿米尼死亡而受到广泛谴责。
description.en: The morality police of Iran, responsible for enforcing Islamic dress codes such as the hijab. Widely condemned for arresting Mahsa Amini, which led to her death.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗最高领袖，将阿米尼示威定性为“暴乱”，并指责其由美国及以色列策划。
description.en: The Supreme Leader of Iran, who characterized the Mahsa Amini protests as 'riots' and accused the United States and Israel of planning them.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗总统，在阿米尼示威期间下令加大头巾执法力度，并同意调查玛莎·阿米尼之死。
description.en: President of Iran who ordered stricter enforcement of the hijab law during the Mahsa Amini protests and agreed to investigate the death of Mahsa Amini.

description.zh-cn: 始于2017年的伊朗女性抗议运动，反对强制佩戴头巾，被视为阿米尼示威的前身和组成部分。
description.en: A protest movement by women in Iran against the compulsory hijab, which started in 2017. It is considered a precursor and a component of the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 阿米尼示威中最为流传的口号，代表了示威的核心诉求。该运动与玛莎·阿米尼被追授2023年萨哈罗夫奖。
description.en: The most popular slogan in the Mahsa Amini protests, representing the core demands of the movement. The movement, along with Mahsa Amini, was posthumously awarded the 2023 Sakharov Prize.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗律师、前法官、人权活动家，2003年诺贝尔和平奖得主。她表示阿米尼示威的目标是推翻政权。
description.en: An Iranian lawyer, former judge, and human rights activist, who won the Nobel Peace Prize in 2003. She stated that the goal of the Amini protests is to overthrow the regime.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗的国家足球队。在2022年世界杯期间，球员通过不唱国歌等方式表达对阿米尼示威的支持。
description.en: The national football team of Iran. During the 2022 World Cup, players expressed their support for the Mahsa Amini protests by not singing the national anthem.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗前国脚，因在社交媒体上声援阿米尼示威而被捕。
description.en: A former player of the Iran national football team who was arrested for supporting the Mahsa Amini protests on social media.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府对伊朗政府镇压示威的行为表示谴责，并支持抗议者。伊朗最高领袖哈梅内伊则指责美国策划了这场“暴乱”。
description.en: The United States government condemned the Iranian government's crackdown on the protests and supported the demonstrators. Iran's Supreme Leader Khamenei accused the U.S. of orchestrating the 'riots'.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗最高领袖哈梅内伊指责以色列与美国共同策划了阿米尼示威。以色列总理则批评伊朗政权为“杀人政府”。
description.en: Iran's Supreme Leader Khamenei accused Israel of co-planning the Amini protests with the United States. The Israeli Prime Minister criticized the Iranian regime as a 'murderous regime'.

nodes.id: 联合国经济及社会理事会

zh-cn: 联合国经济及社会理事会
en: United Nations Economic and Social Council

description.zh-cn: 联合国主要机构之一，于2022年12月14日投票决定将伊朗从联合国妇女地位委员会中除名，以回应伊朗政府对示威的镇压。
description.en: One of the principal organs of the United Nations, which voted on December 14, 2022, to remove Iran from the Commission on the Status of Women in response to the government's crackdown on protests.

description.zh-cn: 西亚国家，阿米尼示威的发生地。
description.en: A country in Western Asia where the Mahsa Amini protests took place.

nodes.id: 联合国妇女地位委员会

zh-cn: 联合国妇女地位委员会
en: UN Commission on the Status of Women

description.zh-cn: 联合国经社理事会下的一个职司委员会，伊朗因镇压阿米尼示威于2022年被取消其成员资格。
description.en: A functional commission of the UN Economic and Social Council. Iran's membership was revoked in 2022 due to its suppression of the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗的情报机构，指控并逮捕了报道玛莎·阿米尼之死的两名女记者，称她们是外国间谍。
description.en: The intelligence agency of Iran, which accused and arrested two female journalists who reported on the death of Mahsa Amini, branding them as foreign agents.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗女记者，因报道玛莎·阿米尼之死而被伊朗情报部逮捕，并被指控为外国间谍。
description.en: An Iranian female journalist who was arrested by the Ministry of Intelligence and accused of being a foreign agent for her reporting on the death of Mahsa Amini.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗女记者，因报道玛莎·阿米尼之死而被伊朗情报部逮捕，并被指控为外国间碟。
description.en: An Iranian female journalist who was arrested by the Ministry of Intelligence and accused of being a foreign agent for her reporting on the death of Mahsa Amini.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗的武装部队之一，其总司令侯赛因·萨拉米警告示威者，并指控沙特阿拉伯支持示威。
description.en: One of Iran's armed forces. Its commander, Hossein Salami, warned protesters and accused Saudi Arabia of supporting the demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗伊斯兰革命卫队总司令，认为示威背后有来自沙特阿拉伯的支持。
description.en: Commander-in-Chief of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps, who believed that Saudi Arabia was behind the protests.

description.zh-cn: 被伊朗伊斯兰革命卫队总司令侯赛因·萨拉米指控支持阿米尼示威。
description.en: Accused by Hossein Salami, Commander-in-Chief of the IRGC, of supporting the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 联合国下属机构，于2022年11月通过决议，谴责伊朗镇压示威者，并成立调查团调查伊朗当局的行为。
description.en: A United Nations body that passed a resolution in November 2022 condemning Iran's crackdown on protesters and establishing a fact-finding mission to investigate the authorities' actions.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的立法机构，通过决议谴责伊朗政府，并将2023年萨哈罗夫奖追授给玛莎·阿米尼和“女性、生命、自由”运动。
description.en: The legislative body of the European Union, which passed a resolution condemning the Iranian government and posthumously awarded the 2023 Sakharov Prize to Mahsa Amini and the 'Woman, Life, Freedom' movement.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲议会设立的人权奖项。2023年，该奖项被追授给玛莎·阿米尼及“女性、生命、自由”运动。
description.en: A human rights prize established by the European Parliament. In 2023, it was posthumously awarded to Mahsa Amini and the 'Woman, Life, Freedom' movement.

description.zh-cn: 诺贝尔奖项之一。2023年，该奖项授予伊朗人权活动家纳尔吉斯·穆罕默迪，以表彰她为伊朗受压迫女性的斗争。
description.en: One of the Nobel Prizes. In 2023, it was awarded to Iranian human rights activist Narges Mohammadi for her fight against the oppression of women in Iran.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗人权活动家，因“为伊朗受压迫的女性而战、为促进所有人的人权及自由而战”而获得2023年诺贝尔和平奖。
description.en: An Iranian human rights activist who was awarded the 2023 Nobel Peace Prize 'for her fight against the oppression of women in Iran and her fight to promote human rights and freedom for all'.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大政府对伊朗镇压示威的行为表示谴责，并对伊朗道德警察及其他官员实施制裁。
description.en: The Canadian government condemned Iran's crackdown on protests and imposed sanctions on Iran's morality police and other officials.

description.zh-cn: 德国政府批评伊朗政权镇压示威，并呼吁欧盟对伊朗实施进一步制裁。
description.en: The German government criticized the Iranian regime for suppressing protests and called on the EU to impose further sanctions on Iran.

description.zh-cn: 此次选举中，强硬保守派候选人易卜拉欣·莱希当选伊朗总统。
description.en: In this election, the hardline conservative candidate Ebrahim Raisi was elected President of Iran.

nodes.id: 伊朗伊斯兰共和国执法部队

zh-cn: 伊朗伊斯兰共和国执法部队
en: Law Enforcement Command of Islamic Republic of Iran

description.zh-cn: 伊朗的执法机构，其下属的指导巡逻队逮捕了玛莎·阿米尼。
description.en: The law enforcement agency of Iran, whose subordinate unit, the Guidance Patrol, arrested Mahsa Amini.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗退役足球运动员，因支持示威而被捕。
description.en: A retired Iranian footballer who was arrested for supporting the protests.

description.zh-cn: 在阿米尼示威中身亡的伊朗少女，德国多特蒙德足球俱乐部球迷曾展示横幅悼念她。
description.en: An Iranian teenage girl who died during the Mahsa Amini protests. Fans of the German football club Borussia Dortmund displayed a banner to mourn her.

description.zh-cn: 德国足球俱乐部，其球迷在比赛中展示横幅，声援阿米尼示威并悼念遇难者萨丽娜·伊斯梅尔扎德。
description.en: A German football club whose fans displayed a banner during a match to show solidarity with the Mahsa Amini protests and to mourn the victim Sarina Esmailzadeh.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗攀岩女运动员，因在亚洲攀岩锦标赛上未戴头巾参赛而受到关注，后据报道被软禁。
description.en: An Iranian female rock climber who gained attention for competing without a hijab at the Asian Climbing Championships and was later reportedly placed under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 美国足球的管理机构。在2022年世界杯期间，该协会为支持伊朗示威者，在社交媒体上发布了不含伊朗国徽的伊朗国旗图片。
description.en: The governing body of soccer in the United States. During the 2022 World Cup, it posted an image of the Iranian flag without the national emblem on social media to support protesters in Iran.

description.zh-cn: 1979年导致伊朗建立政教合一制度的革命。革命后对妇女权利的压制和强制佩戴头巾的法律是阿米尼示威的深层背景。
description.en: The 1979 revolution that led to the establishment of a theocracy in Iran. The suppression of women's rights and compulsory hijab laws after the revolution are the deep-seated background to the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 玛莎·阿米尼在被道德警察逮捕后死亡，直接引发了全国范围的阿米尼示威。
description.en: The death of Mahsa Amini after being arrested by the morality police directly triggered the nationwide Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 指导巡逻队因“违反着装规范”逮捕了玛莎·阿米尼，阿米尼在被拘留期间死亡。
description.en: The Guidance Patrol arrested Mahsa Amini for 'improper hijab', and Amini died while in custody.

relationships.target: 伊朗伊斯兰共和国执法部队

description.zh-cn: 指导巡逻队是伊朗伊斯兰共和国执法部队下属的单位。
description.en: The Guidance Patrol is a unit under the Law Enforcement Command of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

relationships.target: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 阿米尼示威的目标之一是推翻伊朗伊斯兰共和国政府。
description.en: One of the goals of the Mahsa Amini protests is to overthrow the Government of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

relationships.source: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 伊朗政府通过武力镇压、网络封锁等手段来压制阿米尼示威。
description.en: The Iranian government suppressed the Mahsa Amini protests through means such as violent crackdowns and internet blackouts.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗最高领袖阿里·哈梅内伊将示威定性为“暴乱”，并支持对其进行镇压。
description.en: Iran's Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei labeled the protests as 'riots' and supported the crackdown against them.

description.zh-cn: 阿里·哈梅内伊宣称阿米尼示威是由美国策划的。
description.en: Ali Khamenei claimed that the Mahsa Amini protests were orchestrated by the United States.

description.zh-cn: 阿里·哈梅内伊宣称阿米尼示威是由以色列策划的。
description.en: Ali Khamenei claimed that the Mahsa Amini protests were orchestrated by Israel.

relationships.target: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 易卜拉欣·莱希于2021年当选为伊朗总统。
description.en: Ebrahim Raisi was elected President of Iran in 2021.

description.zh-cn: “革命街女孩”运动是反对强制头巾的早期抗议形式，为后来的阿米尼示威奠定了基础，阿米尼示威也被视为该运动的一部分。
description.en: The 'Girls of Enghelab Street' movement was an earlier form of protest against the compulsory hijab, laying the groundwork for the later Mahsa Amini protests, which are also considered part of this movement.

description.zh-cn: “女性、生命、自由”是阿米尼示威中最核心和流传最广的口号。
description.en: 'Woman, Life, Freedom' is the central and most widely circulated slogan of the Mahsa Amini protests.

relationships.source: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 伊朗退役足球运动员侯赛因·马希尼因支持示威而被捕。
description.en: Retired Iranian footballer Hossein Mahini was arrested for supporting the protests.

relationships.source: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 伊朗少女萨丽娜·伊斯梅尔扎德在阿米尼示威中被安全部队杀害。
description.en: Iranian teenager Sarina Esmailzadeh was killed by security forces during the Mahsa Amini protests.

description.zh-cn: 德国多特蒙德足球俱乐部的球迷在比赛中展示横幅，声援阿米尼示威并悼念遇难者萨丽娜·伊斯梅尔扎德。
description.en: Fans of the German football club Borussia Dortmund displayed a banner during a match to show solidarity with the Mahsa Amini protests and mourn the victim Sarina Esmailzadeh.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗攀岩运动员埃尔纳兹·雷卡比在比赛中未佩戴头巾，此举被视为对阿米尼示威的支持。
description.en: Iranian climber Elnaz Rekabi competed without wearing a hijab, an act seen as a gesture of support for the Mahsa Amini protests.

relationships.source: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 在未戴头巾参加比赛后，据报道埃尔纳兹·雷卡比被伊朗当局软禁。
description.en: After competing without a hijab, Elnaz Rekabi was reportedly placed under house arrest by Iranian authorities.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年世界杯对阵英格兰的比赛前，伊朗国家队球员集体拒唱国歌，以示对国内示威的支持。
description.en: Before their 2022 World Cup match against England, players of the Iran national team collectively refused to sing the national anthem as a sign of support for the domestic protests.

relationships.source: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 伊朗前国脚沃里亚·加富里因在社交媒体声援示威而被捕。
description.en: Former Iran national team player Voria Ghafouri was arrested for supporting the protests on social media.

description.zh-cn: 为支持伊朗示威者，美国足协在社交媒体上发布了不含伊朗国徽的伊朗国旗图片。
description.en: To support protesters in Iran, the U.S. Soccer Federation posted an image of the Iranian flag on social media without its national emblem.

relationships.source: 联合国经济及社会理事会

description.zh-cn: 联合国经济及社会理事会投票决定将伊朗从联合国妇女地位委员会中除名，以回应伊朗政府对示威的镇压。
description.en: The UN Economic and Social Council voted to remove Iran from the Commission on the Status of Women in response to the government's crackdown on protests.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗情报部逮捕了报道玛莎·阿米尼之死的记者尼罗法·哈米迪，并指控其为外国间谍。
description.en: The Iranian Ministry of Intelligence arrested journalist Niloofar Hamedi, who reported on the death of Mahsa Amini, and accused her of being a foreign agent.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗情报部逮捕了报道玛莎·阿米尼之死的记者埃拉赫·穆罕默迪，并指控其为外国间谍。
description.en: The Iranian Ministry of Intelligence arrested journalist Elaheh Mohammadi, who reported on the death of Mahsa Amini, and accused her of being a foreign agent.

description.zh-cn: 侯赛因·萨拉米是伊朗伊斯兰革命卫队总司令。
description.en: Hossein Salami is the Commander-in-Chief of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰革命卫队总司令侯赛因·萨拉米警告沙特阿拉伯，指责其支持阿米尼示威。
description.en: Hossein Salami, Commander-in-Chief of the IRGC, warned Saudi Arabia, accusing it of supporting the Mahsa Amini protests.

relationships.target: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 联合国人权理事会通过决议，成立调查团调查伊朗当局对示威的镇压行为。
description.en: The UN Human Rights Council passed a resolution to establish a fact-finding mission to investigate the Iranian authorities' crackdown on the protests.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲议会负责授予萨哈罗夫奖。
description.en: The European Parliament is responsible for awarding the Sakharov Prize.

description.zh-cn: 2023年萨哈罗夫奖被追授给玛莎·阿米尼，以表彰她为自由和平等进行的抗争。
description.en: The 2023 Sakharov Prize was posthumously awarded to Mahsa Amini in recognition of her fight for freedom and equality.

description.zh-cn: 2023年萨哈罗夫奖被授予“女性、生命、自由”运动，以表彰其为自由和平等进行的抗争。
description.en: The 2023 Sakharov Prize was awarded to the 'Woman, Life, Freedom' movement in recognition of its fight for freedom and equality.

description.zh-cn: 因其为伊朗受压迫女性的斗争，纳尔吉斯·穆罕默迪被授予2023年诺贝尔和平奖。
description.en: Narges Mohammadi was awarded the 2023 Nobel Peace Prize for her fight against the oppression of women in Iran.

relationships.target: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 加拿大政府宣布对伊朗道德警察及多名官员实施制裁，以回应其对示威的镇压。
description.en: The Canadian government announced sanctions against Iran's morality police and several officials in response to their crackdown on protests.

relationships.target: 伊朗伊斯蘭共和国政府

description.zh-cn: 德国政府谴责伊朗政权镇压示威，并呼吁欧盟对相关责任人实施制裁。
description.en: The German government condemned the Iranian regime's suppression of protests and called for EU sanctions against those responsible.

description.zh-cn: 强硬保守派候选人易卜拉欣·莱希在2021年伊朗总统选举中获胜，成为伊朗总统。
description.en: Hardline conservative candidate Ebrahim Raisi won the 2021 Iranian presidential election, becoming the President of Iran.

description.zh-cn: 1979年的伊朗伊斯兰革命建立了现行的政教合一制度，深刻地影响了伊朗的社会和政治结构，包括妇女权利和着装规范。
description.en: The 1979 Iranian Islamic Revolution established the current theocratic system, profoundly influencing Iran's social and political structure, including women's rights and dress codes.
